author: dug
msg: Removed client need for servlet.jar and made the classloader
use the same classloader that loaded everything else, instead
of the system class loader (issues noticed by Sam Ruby).

msg: Thanks to David Melgar (dmelgar@us.ibm.com) for finding/fixing this one!

msg: Client chains were not being deployed properly
